question: A plumber works for 4 weeks every month and for 6 days every week. If he gets paid €65 every day, how much does he earn if he works for a year?
answer:
The plumber works for 6 days every week and works for 4 weeks every month so he works for 6 days/week * 4 weeks/month = <<6*4=24>>24 days/month
If he earns €65 every day he then earns €65/day * 24 days/month = €<<65*24=1560>>1560/month
A year is equal to 12 months so every year he earns €1560/month * 12 months/year = €<<1560*12=18,720>>18,720
#### 18,720
